steps.title: Run your player toward the basket using the left stick on your Xbox 360 controller.
steps.content: Run your player toward the basket using the left stick on your Xbox 360 controller.

steps.title: Press the right trigger button and point the right stick in the direction of the basket.
steps.content: Press the right trigger button and point the right stick in the direction of the basket.

steps.title: Press the X button to execute the shot.
steps.content: Press the X button to execute the shot. Your player will dunk the ball into the basket. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Run your player toward the basket using the left stick on your PS3 controller.
steps.content: Run your player toward the basket using the left stick on your PS3 controller.

steps.title: Press and hold the R2 button, and point the right stick in the direction of the basket.
steps.content: Press and hold the R2 button, and point the right stick in the direction of the basket.

steps.title: Press the square button to execute the shot.
steps.content: Press the square button to execute the shot. Your player will dunk the ball into the basket. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select the option to “Manage Rosters” after signing in to NBA 2K14.
steps.content: Select the option to “Manage Rosters” after signing in to NBA 2K14.

steps.title: Select the player for whom you want to enable a special dunk package, then select “Edit Player.
steps.content: Select the player for whom you want to enable a special dunk package, then select “Edit Player. ”

steps.title: Scroll down to the bottom of the list and highlight “Go-To Dunk Package.
steps.content: Scroll down to the bottom of the list and highlight “Go-To Dunk Package. ”

steps.title: Select your preferred dunk package from the options provided.
steps.content: Select your preferred dunk package from the options provided. The dunk package options will vary depending on the player, gaming stats, and on whether you’ve managed to unlocked any dunk packages during gameplay. Examples of special dunk packages are “Sprite Zero Gravity” and “360 Dunk.”

steps.title: Save your changes, then navigate back to the main menu.
steps.content: Save your changes, then navigate back to the main menu.

steps.title: Select the option to play in practice/training mode.
steps.content: Select the option to play in practice/training mode.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen tutorial to learn how to execute the special dunk you selected.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen tutorial to learn how to execute the special dunk you selected. The instructions will vary depending on the type of dunk you choose. For example, to execute a 360 dunk, drive your player toward the basket using the steps outlined in methods one or two, while moving the left stick in a clockwise direction prior to executing your shot. [3] X Research source
